Targetkan Jadi Lumbung Padi Dunia, Petani Purwakarta Dapat Bantuan
06 Nov 2019, 02:50 by Advertorial
PURWAKARTA, (PR).- Petani Purwakarta mendapat bantuan  Traktor sebanyak lima unit, Pompa Air sebanyak 15 unit, serta Cultivator atau alat penggarap khusus lahan kering sebanyak 17 unit dari pemerintah pusat. 
“Hari ini, bantuan tersebut telah didistribusikan ke masing-masing kelompok tani,” ujar Kepala Dinas Pangan dan Pertanian Kabupaten Purwakarta, Agus Rachlan Suherlan, belum lama ini.
Petani di Kabupaten Purwakarta, sejauh ini kerap dimanjakan oleh Kementerian Pertanian. Salah satunya, melalui pemberian bantuan yang mereka perlukan guna peningkatan produktifitas pertanian mereka.
Berbagai inovasi untuk peningkatan produktifitas pertanian khususnya jenis padi itu, sengaja dilakukan oleh pemerintah. Apalagi, pemerintah menargetkan 2045 mendatang Indonesia bisa menjadi lumbung pangan dunia.
Agus menjelaskan, sejak 2014 lalu para petani melalui kelompoknya kerap mendapat bantuan alat pertanian. Hingga 2019 ini tercacat, untuk bantuan Traktor yang sudah disebar mencapai 281 unit. Kemudian, untuk Pompa Air, 238 unit. Sedangkan, untuk alat Cultivator mencapai 31 unit.
“Masing – masing kelompok mendapat satu unit,” jelas dia.
Menurut Agus, seluruh bantuan itu sengaja digelontorkan untuk meningkatkan kesejahteraan, taraf hidup dan kemandirian para petani dalam memenuhi kecukupan pangan. 
Sementara itu, Bupati Purwakarta, Anne Ratna Mustika menambahkan, petani merupakan penggerak utama di sektor pertanian. Sehingga, harus dimanjakan. Namun demikian, pihaknya berharap para petani bisa memanfaatkan bantuan tersebut secara maksimal, guna mendorong peningkatan produktivitas pertanian.
“Kami berharap, bantuan ini bisa termanfaatkan dengan baik. Kami juga berharap, bantuan bisa turut mendorong supaya generasi muda bisa kembali tertarik di sektor pertanian,” ujar Anne.***

Aims to Become World Rice Reserves, Purwakarta Farmers Can Help
06 Nov 2019, 02:50 by Advertorial
PURWAKARTA, (PR) .- Purwakarta farmers receive assistance of five units of Tractors, 15 units of Water Pumps, and 17 units of Cultivator or dry land cultivation equipment from the central government.
"Today, the aid has been distributed to each farmer group," said the Head of the Purwakarta Regency Food and Agriculture Office, Agus Rachlan Suherlan, recently.
Farmers in Purwakarta Regency, so far often often spoiled by the Ministry of Agriculture. One of them is by providing the assistance they need to increase their agricultural productivity.
Various innovations to increase agricultural productivity, especially the type of rice, deliberately carried out by the government. Moreover, the government targets that in 2045 Indonesia will become a global food barn.
Agus explained, since 2014 farmers through their groups often received assistance from farming tools. Until 2019 this was flawed, for the assistance of Tractors which had been distributed reached 281 units. Then, for the Water Pump, 238 units. Meanwhile, for the Cultivator tool it reaches 31 units.
"Each group gets one unit," he explained.
According to Agus, all the assistance was deliberately poured out to improve the welfare, standard of living and independence of the farmers in meeting food sufficiency.
Meanwhile, Purwakarta Regent, Anne Ratna Mustika added, farmers are the main movers in the agriculture sector. So, it must be spoiled. However, he hoped that the farmers could utilize the assistance to the maximum, in order to encourage increased agricultural productivity.
"We hope that this assistance can be utilized well. We also hope that assistance can help encourage young people to be interested again in the agricultural sector, "said Anne. ***
